Title = Base64 tests

Encoding = canonical

# Tolerate missing newline
Encoding = valid
Input = "hello"
Output = "aGVsbG8="

# Don't tolerate extra trailing '='
Encoding = invalid
Input = "hello"
Output = "aGVsbG8==\n"

Encoding = invalid
Output = "aGVsbG8===\n"

# Don't tolerate data after '='
Encoding = invalid
Output = "aGV=sbG8=\n"

# Newlines are ignored
Encoding = valid
Input = "hello"
Output = "aGV\nsbG8=\n"
